title: cant use space in summoner name on new account
body: i am unable to add a space in my username for my new account it just says letters and numbers only

replies.body: Usernames can only use regular characters, and cannot use spaces. You're able to use a-z, A-Z, 0-9 for usernames. Summoner Names however can use spaces, keep in mind your username and Summoner name are different. Your Summoner Name is what appears is game, where your username is what you use to login on the client.
